name: Parking Management System
desc: Designed hardware and firmware for parking system using Tiva TM4C123G, ESP32, and sensors. Implemented PWM control, I2C OLED display, and local web server.

name: L1-Split Cache Simulation
desc: Engineered 32-bit processor cache with MESI protocol for coherence and LRU replacement policy. Split cache: 16KB instruction + 16KB data.

name: Asynchronous/Synchronous FIFO
desc: Designed Verilog code for synchronous and asynchronous FIFO with 8x8 memory. Implemented full, empty, almost full, and almost empty signals.

name: Booth's Multiplier
desc: Designed 4-bit wide Booth's multiplier in Verilog for one-bit and multibit scanning with 100% accuracy for all test cases.

name: Object Detection using CNN
desc: Developed object detection system using TensorFlow and Keras with ResNet-18 architecture. Achieved 93% accuracy on CIFAR-10 dataset.

name: Ripple Carry Adder Simulation
desc: Designed 32-bit Ripple carry adder in C. Simulated functionality and delay for 10,000 random input pairs with 100% accuracy.

name: Superscalar Pipelined Processor
desc: Programmed Verilog code for branch predictor, memory, cache, ALU and five-stage pipeline. Implemented RTL and evaluated processor performance.

name: Smart Glove for Blind People
desc: Developed navigation system for visually impaired using Arduino Uno, GSM, GPS, and MEMS. Integrated fall detection with 3-axis accelerometer.

name: Sound Detector using ARM
desc: Sound detection system for home automation and security using ARM LPC2148 controller. Simulated prototype in Proteus Professional.

name: Automatic Street Light Control
desc: Power-saving street light system using IC 555 interfacing and sensors. Automatically switches lights based on ambient light levels.

name: Water Level Control System
desc: Automatic water level monitoring system to prevent overflow using 8051 Microcontroller. Controls water pump based on tank levels.

name: DTMF Controlled Vehicle
desc: Remote-controlled vehicle using Dual Tone Multi Frequency (DTMF) technology. Assembled hardware and implemented control system.

name: Accident Detection System
desc: Accident detection and alert system using GSM, GPS and MEMS. Sends emergency messages to registered mobile numbers upon detection.
